pre_caption: This is a high-angle, daytime shot of a large, reddish-brown bascule bridge spanning a wide city river. The bridge is occupied by a convoy of military tanks. Several tour boats and other vessels are present in the water below and around the bridge.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
